about_the_game:
Skull Stompers: Gold Edition has 6 additional characters compared to the free version, making 12 characters total if you include FREE edition and Gold Edition DLC. Also featured exclusively in the Gold Edition of Skull Stompers is DEVILS DOORSTEP - the creators favorite way to play Skull Stompers! Beating this mode unlocks every character in the game INSTANTLY!

This is the ULTIMATE VERSION OF THE GAME! And over time, it will only get better as new features are added all the time. If you have any ideas how to improve the game, again, join our discord and suggest what you'd like to see added to the game and I'll try my best to add your ideas!
(Right side of this page, the Skull Stompers discord server is listed)



DEVILS DOORSTEP:
One giant map with 4 branching paths, each path leads to a key. Collect all 4 keys and get to the devil, slay him - and win.

Only one problem - got to do it one life!

THAT'S THE CHALLENGE. CAN YOU SURVIVE THE DEVILS DOORSTEP AND MAKE IT OUT ALIVE?

Skull Stompers: GOLD edition is a dark comedy platformer where you join the "Skull Stompers" which is has a eccentric cast of 10 characters — on a mission to save humanity and free mind-controlled furries. The furries have been brainwashed to steal Elon Musk's recreational nukes and unleash chaos, and it’s up to you to stomp your way to their salvation—no matter how messy it gets.

This gory, satirical adventure pulls no punches, poking fun at everyone and everything without taking political sides. Featuring nine unique playable characters, each with different stats and 40 hilarious lines of dialogue, it’s a chaotic ride like no other.

ALSO:

Built using the Godot 4 engine in just six months by a first-time coder, the game’s irreverent tone led to controversy, even resulting in a ban from Godot communities for being unapologetically ‘unwoke.’ Dive into this wild, no-holds-barred platformer and enjoy the madness!

content_descriptors.notes: It has gore and violence, and profanity.

name: Skull Stompers - GOLD Edition

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Dual-core 2.0 GHz or equivalent
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated GPU (e.g., Intel HD Graphics 4000 or equivalent)
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-1300F
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 510
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

short_description: Stomp skulls as zany characters in a chaotic adventure that spares no one—no political sides taken, just unapologetic, good old-fashioned stomping! Now choose from 12 characters (instead of original 6), each with unique stats and dialogue. Also includes NEW "DEVILS DOORSTEP" mode.
